meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Katrina Whitehead Les Chun Sam Hopkins Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6619.

td.p: Katrina Whitehead, a strategic analyst from Sandston, Virginia
Les Chun, a property manager from San Francisco, California
Sam Hopkins, an M.B.A. student originally from Prairie Village, Kansas (whose 1-day cash winnings total $19,201)

tr.td: SOFA'S CHOICE
IN THE CAPITAL CITY
"PARTY" TIME!
TREES THE CHARM
CHARITABLE ORGANIZATIONS
(Alex: We want you to name the film as...)
JOHNNY GILBERT GOES TO THE MOVIES

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law. This website is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or operated by Jeopardy Productions, Inc. Join the discussion at JBoard.tv.
